ProductInfo.Features:

16 Gigabyte SDHC Secure Digital Memory Card - SD USB Memory Card Reader - 12 Slot Foldable Memory Card Case
Additional EN-EL15 Rechargeable Lithium ion Replacement Battery Pack - SLR Camera Multi-Compartment Gadget Bag with Pockets & Neck Strap
UV (Ultraviolet) Protection Filter - 5pc. Deluxe Lens Care & Cleaning Kit - Package of LCD Screen Protectors - Quality Fiber Cleaning Cloth
